Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute near Desplaines/Lake
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses temp. rerouted near Desplaines/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Desplaines/Lake, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Madison, LaSalle, Grand, Milwaukee, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Milwaukee, Grand, LaSalle, Washington, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: Westbound #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, LaSalle, 39th, Normal, Root, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
